javadoc: A class that gets the appropriate COFF relocation handler for a specific COFF.

methods.name: getHandler
methods.comment:
Gets the appropriate COFF relocation handler that is capable of relocating the COFF that is
 defined by the given COFF file header.

params.name: fileHeader
params.comment: The file header associated with the COFF to relocate.

return.comment:
The appropriate COFF relocation handler that is capable of relocating the COFF that 
     is defined by the given COFF file header.  Could return null if there if no such handler
     was found.

name: CoffRelocationHandlerFactory
comment: A class that gets the appropriate COFF relocation handler for a specific COFF.
